member.name: T:Uhuru.Prison.Data.Connection
member.summary: This class provides a helper function to get to a PrisonEntities object that is connected to the database that sits next to the bits.

member.name: F:Uhuru.Prison.Data.Connection.DatabaseFile
member.summary:
The path to the local SQLite database, relative to the location of the Uhuru.Prison.Data assembly.
We assume it's always next to the assemblies.

member.name: F:Uhuru.Prison.Data.Connection.ConnectionString
member.summary: An Entity Framework template connection string for the PrisonModel.

member.name: M:Uhuru.Prison.Data.Connection.GetPrisonEntities
member.summary: Gets the a PrisonEntities object that is connected to the local SQLite database.
member.returns: A PrisonEntities object connected to the 'prison.s3db' database that exists next to the assembly.

member.name: T:Uhuru.Prison.Data.PrisonEntities
member.summary: This is a partial implementation of the PrisonEntities class that is auto-generated by the EntityFramework.

member.name: M:Uhuru.Prison.Data.PrisonEntities.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. We need this constructor in order to programatically connect to a database, without the need for a configuration file.
